When the game begins, you'll be given a unique base word. Use the letters from the base word to create new words, known as anagrams!
Each word must have at least four letters, but longer words and uncommon letters will net you more points
You only have a limited amount of time so try to come up with as many anagrams as you can before time runs out!
Earn bonus points from submitting every single anagram possible within the time limit!
